events.message: Customer reported a vehicle accident that occurred on April 28th, involving a collision with another car at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of a car collision provided by the claimant.
Insurance agent Michael Davis has been assigned to handle the claim and will follow up with the claimant shortly.
Acknowledged receipt of the claim from the customer and confirmed the initial details for further processing.
Requested submission of police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates to proceed with claim investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report, photos of damage, and repair invoices promptly.
Investigation team has begun the inquiry into the details of the collision to verify the circumstances and damages.
Investigation completed with confirmation of fault and assessment of damages consistent with submitted evidence.
A settlement offer has been proposed outlining the coverage amount for vehicle repairs and related expenses.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed appreciation for the smooth handling of the claim.
Claim has been approved by the underwriting team following agreed settlement terms for repairs and fees.
Payment was issued to the repair shop and customerâ€™s account to cover all approved vehicle damage expenses.
The claim case has been officially closed after successful payment and confirmation of vehicle repairs completion.
All claim documents and records have been archived for future reference and regulatory compliance purposes.
